summary: The Globe is a small, but visionary newspaper started by Phineas Mitchell, an editor recently fired by The Star. The two newspapers become enemies, and the Star's ruthless heiress Charity Hackett decides to eliminate the competition.
cast: Gene Evans|Mary Welch|Bela Kovacs|Herbert Heyes|Tina Pine|George O'Hanlon|J.M. Kerrigan|Forrest Taylor|Don Orlando|Neyle Morrow|Dick Elliott|Stuart Randall|Dee Pollock|Hal K. Dawson|Robert Carson|Edward Clark|Heinie Conklin|Jean Del Val|Monk Eastman|Charles Horvath|Frank Marlowe|William J. O'Brien|'Snub' Pollard|Stanley Price|Jeffrey Sayre|Max Wagner
title: La voz de la primera plana
